title: Archiv Agency premium travel website: complete routing, unique images, theme-color branding, and required pages/features

requirements.text: Ensure the Home page loads as the default first page and that every top-nav route renders without any 'Not Found' or blank-state errors: Home (/), About (/about), Tour Guide (/tour-guide), Services (/services), Tour Packages (/tour-packages), Vehicles (/vehicles), Honeymoon Offers (/honeymoon-offers), Booking (/booking).

quotes: No "Not Found" Issue - The Home page must open perfectly as the first page. - All menu links must work properly.
The top menu bar must include: Home, About, Tour Guide, Services, Tour Packages, Vehicles, Honeymoon Offers, Booking

acceptanceCriteria: Launching the app opens the Home page (route '/') successfully.
Clicking each navbar item navigates to its corresponding page and renders content without errors.
There is no route in the navbar that leads to a missing component, empty page, or console error.

requirements.text: Implement the exact required navigation menu labels and order in the top navbar (desktop and mobile): Home, About, Tour Guide, Services, Tour Packages, Vehicles, Honeymoon Offers, Booking.

quotes:
Perfect Navigation Menu (Same as Below)

The top menu bar must include:

- Home
- About
- Tour Guide
- Services
- Tour Packages
- Vehicles
- Honeymoon Offers
- Booking

acceptanceCriteria: Navbar displays exactly the 8 specified items in the specified order on desktop.
Mobile menu displays the same 8 items in the same order.
All 8 items link to the correct routes.

requirements.text: Update site copy to match brand and hero CTA requirements: set backend site info tagline to "Your Trusted Partner for Unforgettable Travel Experiences" and update the Home hero to include the CTA text "Explore the World With Archiv Agency" (as the primary call-to-action messaging in the hero).

quotes:
Hero banner with strong CTA:
   "Explore the World With Archiv Agency"

Home Page - Hero section with tagline:
  "Your Trusted Partner for Unforgettable Travel Experiences"

acceptanceCriteria: backend/main.mo getSiteInfo().tagline returns exactly "Your Trusted Partner for Unforgettable Travel Experiences".
Home hero prominently displays "Explore the World With Archiv Agency".
User-facing brand name appears as "Archiv Agency" in the navbar/branding.

requirements.text: Ensure every page and major section uses unique, high-quality travel imagery with no repeated images across the site (including cards/grids). Use real-time stock-style images (e.g., Unsplash/Pexels-like URLs) covering: beaches, mountains, cities, adventure tours, honeymoon destinations, and vehicles/transport.

quotes:
Unique Real-Time Images (No Repeated Images)
- Do NOT use the same image everywhere.
- Each section must have different high-quality travel images:
   • Beaches
   • Mountains
   • Cities
   • Adventure Tours
   • Honeymoon Destinations
   • Vehicles & Transport

Use real-time unique stock images like Unsplash/Pexels style.
Every page must have fresh and different visuals.

acceptanceCriteria: No two sections/cards across the entire site reuse the same image URL/file.
Home includes distinct images for the hero, featured destinations, and offers banner areas.
Tour Guide profiles each have distinct photos.
Tour Packages cards each have distinct images.
Vehicles cards each have distinct images.
Honeymoon page uses distinct romantic-destination imagery that is not reused elsewhere.

requirements.text: Apply a consistent premium/luxury visual system across all pages (typography, spacing, card styles, and subtle animations) matching a high-end travel brand aesthetic; include smooth section transitions/hover states and keep all sections non-empty.

quotes:
Premium Attractive Design
- Website should look like a top travel brand (MakeMyTrip / TripAdvisor style)
- Clean layout, modern fonts, smooth animations
Make the design look like a luxury travel startup website with world-class UI/UX.

acceptanceCriteria: All 8 pages have complete, non-placeholder content and cohesive layout.
Buttons/cards/sections have consistent spacing and visual hierarchy across pages.
Animations are subtle (e.g., hover elevation, fade/slide-in) and do not break layout on mobile.

requirements.text: Implement the theme color feature so that changing the theme color updates the full brand system site-wide: navbar accents, buttons, icons, badges/tags, links and hover effects, and heading highlights. Remove/replace page-specific hardcoded color tokens (e.g., custom 'romantic' color usage) so the theme preset drives the look consistently across all pages.

quotes:
Theme Color Feature (Full Branding)
- When the user selects a theme color, EVERYTHING must update automatically:
   • Navbar
   • Buttons
   • Icons
   • Tags
   • Links & Hover effects
   • Headings highlights
- Theme color must apply consistently across the entire website.

acceptanceCriteria: Switching theme presets changes the visual color of primary buttons, badges, icon accents, link hover states, and highlighted headings across every page.
No page uses a standalone color system that ignores the selected theme preset (e.g., no isolated page-only palette that remains unchanged).
Theme color selection persists across reload (localStorage behavior remains functional).

requirements.text: Home page: implement required sections with premium presentation—hero (with required tagline + CTA), featured destinations section (multiple destination cards with unique images), and an offers banner section (unique imagery and promotional copy).

quotes:
Home Page
- Hero section with tagline:
  "Your Trusted Partner for Unforgettable Travel Experiences"
- Featured destinations with unique images
- Offers banner

acceptanceCriteria: Home includes a featured destinations section with multiple cards and unique images.
Home includes a distinct offers banner section with its own unique image.
Hero contains the required tagline and the CTA text is clearly visible.

requirements.text: Add a testimonials slider/carousel component and surface it on the site (at minimum on the Home page), with multiple testimonials and smooth transitions; ensure it is fully responsive.
acceptanceCriteria: A testimonials slider is visible and rotates between at least 3 testimonials.
User can navigate testimonials (e.g., next/prev or dots) on desktop and mobile.
Slider does not cause layout shift or overflow on small screens.

requirements.text: Booking page: keep a simple booking form and add a WhatsApp contact button that opens WhatsApp with a prefilled message including the selected package (when present); show a clear confirmation message after submission.

quotes:
Booking Page
- Simple booking form
- WhatsApp contact button
- Confirmation message

acceptanceCriteria: Booking page contains a WhatsApp button that opens a wa.me (or WhatsApp) link in a new tab.
The WhatsApp prefilled message includes the package name when the booking page is opened with a package selected.
Submitting the booking form shows a confirmation message and does not throw errors.

requirements.text: Add a contact section that includes a contact form and an embedded Google Map (iframe embed) and ensure it is reachable from the site (e.g., on Home and/or in the footer).
acceptanceCriteria: A contact form is present with basic fields and a submit interaction (client-side).
A Google Map embed is displayed via iframe and is responsive (no horizontal overflow).
Contact section is accessible via scrolling/navigation without broken anchors.

requirements.text: Implement smooth scrolling behavior for in-page navigation/CTAs and ensure mobile responsiveness across all pages (navbar, grids, cards, forms).
acceptanceCriteria: In-page CTA links that scroll to sections do so smoothly.
All pages render correctly on mobile widths without overlapping elements or clipped content.
Mobile menu opens/closes reliably and routes correctly.

requirements.text: SEO and performance hygiene: update the HTML title and add essential meta tags (description, og:title/og:description) for Archiv Agency; ensure images use appropriate sizing/loading attributes where applicable to keep pages fast.
acceptanceCriteria: frontend/index.html title references "Archiv Agency" (not the template title).
Meta description is present and relevant to Archiv Agency travel services.
Pages avoid obviously oversized images for small containers and do not spam the console with errors/warnings.

requirements.text: Footer: ensure a professional footer includes social media links (e.g., placeholders to Instagram/Facebook/YouTube/LinkedIn) and that links do not break navigation or cause errors.

quotes: Professional footer with social media links

acceptanceCriteria: Footer displays a social links area with at least 3 social icons/links.
Social links open externally (new tab) and do not break SPA routing.
All internal footer links that are shown navigate to valid routes.

constraints: Do not modify files under frontend/src/components/ui (compose existing UI components instead).
Do not edit immutable paths listed by the system (frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.ts, frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.tsx, frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts, frontend/src/main.tsx).
Backend must remain a single Motoko actor in backend/main.mo; only introduce backend/migration.mo if an existing stable state requires migration.
nonGoals: Implementing payments or deposits for bookings.
Persisting bookings in a database or adding admin dashboards.
Adding third-party authentication providers (only Internet Identity is supported).
